entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 10 with temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm near the Coastal mountains. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10 with temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow over southern sections. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
